title: Dr. Manmohan Singh: India’s son, the Pride of the World
snippet: Dr. Manmohan Singh was born on September 26, 1932, in a Sikh family to Gurumukh Singh and Amrit Kaur at a place called Gah in the Punjab state of undivided India. His mother’s name was Amrit Kaur and father’s name was Gurumukh Singh.

title: Manmohan Singh - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2022, Union Transport Minister of Modi Government, Nitin Gadkari said the "country is indebted to Manmohan Singh for the liberalisation that gave a new direction". In 2013, BJP leader Narendra Modi had termed Singh as "night watchman" and a "puppet of the Gandhi family".

title: RIP Manmohan Singh | A look at former PM's family: All you need to know
snippet: He is survived by his wife Gursharan Kaur and three daughters - Upinder Singh, Amrit Singh and Daman Singh. His daughters have made remarkable strides in their respective fields.

title: Former PM Manmohan Singh's love for Amritsar & Chandigarh or a family tale
snippet: The couple has three daughters Upinder Singh, Daman Singh and Amrit Singh. The former PM’s extended family included six sisters and three half-brothers Surinder Singh Kohli, Surjit Singh Kohli and Daljit Singh Kohli.

title: Manmohan Singh’s Three Daughters: Achievers In History, Law, And Literature - No Politician | News | Zee News
snippet: Manmohan Singh, India’s former Prime Minister, is survived by his wife Gursharan Kaur and three accomplished daughters—Upinder Singh, Daman Singh, and Amrit Singh. Upinder Singh, a renowned historian, has authored several notable books, ...
